tool.name: Atlas FASTQ provider
tool.description: Retrieval and download of FASTQ files from ENA and other repositories such as HCA. The tool is used in production pipelines of EMBL-EBI Expression Atlas and Single Cell Expression Atlas.
tool.command:
${fetch_type.script}.sh
#if $fetch_type.script == "fetchFastq": -f "${fetch_type.path}" -t "${fetch_type.target}"
#if $fetch_type.library: -l ${fetch_type.library} #end if
#if $fetch_type.validate_only: -v #end if
#else if $fetch_type.script == "fetchEnaLibraryFastqs": -l ${fetch_type.library} -d "./"
#if $fetch_type.download_type: -t ${fetch_type.download_type} #end if
#if $fetch_type.sepe: -n ${fetch_type.sepe} #end if #end if
#if $retrieval_method: -m ${retrieval_method} #end if
#if $config_file: -c ${config_file} #end if
#if $resource: -s ${resource} #end if
#if $mode: -p ${mode} #end if
#if $fetch_type.script == "fetchFastq": ; mv -f "${fetch_type.target}" dl_from_path.fastq.gz #else if $fetch_type.script == "fetchEnaLibraryFastqs": #if $fetch_type.sepe == "SINGLE": ; mv -f "${fetch_type.library}.fastq.gz" dl_from_lib_single.fastq.gz #else if $fetch_type.sepe == "PAIRED": ; mv -f "${fetch_type.library}_1.fastq.gz" dl_from_lib_pair_1.fastq.gz ; mv -f "${fetch_type.library}_2.fastq.gz" dl_from_lib_pair_2.fastq.gz #end if #end if

param.name: script
param.label: Use file/URI or library
param.help: Download using a path (file or URI) or library ID.

param.name: path
param.label: File or URI
param.help: Use a file path or URI.

param.name: target
param.label: Target file
param.help: Provide the target file name, e.g. 'ERR035229.fastq.gz'

param.name: validate_only
param.label: Validate only, don't download
param.help: Check if you don't want to download and you only want to validate that a source URI is valid.

param.name: library
param.label: ENA library (ENA source files only), by default inferred from file name
param.help: The library ID, which, by default, is inferred from file name. E.g. -l ERR1888646

param.name: library
param.label: ENA library (ENA source files only), by default inferred from file name
param.help: The library ID, which, by default, is inferred from file name. E.g. -l ERR1888646

param.name: download_type
param.label: download type, fastq or SRA file

param.name: retrieval_method
param.label: Retrieval method
param.help: Retrieval method, default 'auto'. Files with HCA source will use the 'hca' download method regardless (-m will have no effect). Private ENA files will be fetched via 'ssh' (-m will have has no effect). The 'http' method refers to an HTTP endpoint in the EBI Fire resource.

param.name: resource
param.label: Resource or directory
param.help: How to fetch the file, e.g. thereâ€™s a specific method for getting results from the Human Cell Atlas' 'Azul' resource. Default: 'auto'.

param.name: mode
param.label: Public or private
param.help: Public or private, defaults to public. Private usable by EBI staff only.

tool.help:
Usage (<file or uri> as main source):
fetchFastq.sh -f <file or uri> -t <target file> [-s <source resource or directory, default 'auto'>] [-m <retrieval method, default 'auto'>] [-p <public or private, default 'public'>] [-l <library, by default inferred from file name>] [-c <config file to override defaults>] [-v <validate only, don't download>] [-d <download type, 'fastq' or 'srr'>]
Usage (<library> as main source):
fetchEnaLibraryFastqs.sh -l <library> -d <output directory> [-m <retrieval method, default 'auto'>] [-s <source directory for method 'dir'>] [-p <public or private, default public>] [-c <config file to override defaults>] [-t <download type, fastq or srr>] [-n <SINGLE or PAIRED, default PAIRED>]
